main_ticker_message: Seasons  come  and  go,  but  good  taste  lives  on. | After  a  brief  return  to  her  roots  in  Thailand,  Rim  Naam’s  Masterchef  Tam  is  back  with  plenty  of  inspiration  to  take  the much-loved cuisine of Bengaluru’s favourite Thai restaurant to even greater heights. Reserve a table today to experience what the best tastes like when it gets even better. | For reservations, call extension 60
optional_ticker_message: Not all good things take time. Introducing express lunches at The Polo Club. Enjoy a two-course Indian or Western menu with a pint of beer or a soft beverage of your choice. It’s not often that a meal so sumptuous can feel so light.
